reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Could improve on office hour availability.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Makes complex topics easy to understand. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting content, but lectures can be disorganized. Assignments are challenging.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments are thought-provoking. Sometimes talks too fast.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Clear explanations and helpful lab sessions. Always available for questions.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in class. Exams are much harder than homework.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions and well-structured course. Heavy reading load.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but struggles to explain complex concepts. Helpful office hours.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with real-world examples. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear and concise lectures. Fair grading but tough exams.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips greatly enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting topics but can be biased in presentations. Good class discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Enthusiastic about the subject. Group projects are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Often goes off-topic. Grading criteria are unclear. Interesting readings though.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant lecturer. Challenging but rewarding course. Great lab component.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Practical approach with real-world case studies. Sometimes rushes through material.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Interesting subject matter. Lectures can be dry. Helpful feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Thorough explanations of complex concepts. Heavy workload but very informative.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher. Makes theory accessible and fun. Great at answering questions.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but fast-paced. Office hours are very helpful for clarification.
